Articles.Content:
Hello

Does anyone know if it's possible to use custom tags in KSP? I assumed I could define my own, since it's only a string name, but I get the following in output_log when I tried just now:



File error:
Tag: Repulsor is not defined!
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) UnityEngine.GameObject:set_tag (string)


Seem like KSP stores a list somewhere and compares when it loads. If custom are not possible, are there some pre-existing ones I can use without screwing something else up?

Many thanks
seems like it might better to use the wheelColliders and wheelCollidersIgnore layers instead of tags?

I was looking to tag wheel colliders into groups, but as I never use the wheelColliders group that might do the trick for just two groups. Maybe the ignore layer might witness too, will require experimentation!

there was a post with a dump of the KSP layers, but it was a long while back. Recently there was a code snippet to dump the list of shaders in KSP, you could probably modify the code to dump list of tags as well.
